config.formatRowPrefix.description: The prefix of each line when the command: `format all` is triggered
use \r\n and three half-angle Spaces: `\r\n`   ,

```markdown

   The first row...

   The second row...
```

use \r\n and two full-angle Spaces: `\r\n　　`,

```markdown

　　The first row...

　　The second row...
```

use three half-angle Spaces:    ,

```markdown
   The first row...
   The second row...
```

use two full-angle Spaces: `　　`,

```markdown
   The first row...
   The second row...
```
